column6:
"The Slavers," Part 5 of 6: Frank Castle is outgunned and outmatched. He's got his primary target in his sight-the executor of heinous crimes against children-but a cadre of well-armed and rigorously trained bodyguards stands in his way. With deadly obstacles and shaky alliances buckling under his feet, Frank has to decide how best to dismember the slavers-does he cut off the arm or the brain of the operation first? And how big a blade should he use? ,2006,1
32 PGS./MAX: EXPLICIT CONTENT ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | colorist:Dan Brown | writer:Garth Ennis | penciller:Leandro Fernandez | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Scott Koblish
